subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Orioles sneaked Steve Trachsel, below, through waivers just in time last week. Over the last three weeks with Baltimore, Trachsel had a 2.73 earned run average. The Cubs took control of the N.L. Central while, over the same three weeks, two of their starters — Carlos Zambrano and Ted Lilly — had E.R.A.’s of 7.23 and 6.55.
